price: Jedhi: "Mee naaf himaa! odoo bishaan keessan dachii keessa gadi lixaa ta'ee eenyu  bishaan yaa'u isiniif fida?"
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
